result.eng: I'd like a pint of beer please.
result.ga: ba mhaith liom pionta beorach le do thoil

result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ liom pionta beoraċ le do ṫoilI'd like a pint of beer please.

result.eng: Pint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}
